% of the Total funds you receive: % del totale dei fondi che ricevi
50% of the stake will be refunded to you: 50% dello stake sarà restituito al tuo indirizzo dopo la terminazione
After publishing or launching, you will: Dopo la pubblicazione o il lancio, non potrai modificare i parametri di voto.
An error occured while submitting your a: Si è verificato un errore durante l'invio delle risposte.
An error occurred on client: Si è verificato un errore all'interno del client
Attend every validation to get a higher: Partecipa ad ogni validazione per ottenere più ricompense
Can not load the flip keywords to modera: Non è possibile caricare le parole chiave del flip per valutare la storia. Si prega di aspettare o ignorare questo flip.
Can not start validation session because: Non è possibile partecipare alla validazione perché non si è attivato l'invito
Non è possibile partecipare alla validazione perché non sono stati inviati i flip.
Come back again to participate in the ne: Torna per partecipare alla prossima sessione di validazione.
Community translation is not available: La traduzione della comunità non è disponibile
Create a new password to export your pri: Crea una nuova password per esportare la tua chiave privata
Declare the winner and pay rewards to or: Dichiara il vincitore e paga le ricompense agli oracoli.
Deleted flip will be moved to the drafts: Il flip eliminato verrà spostato alle bozze.
Deposit will be refunded if your vote ma: Il deposito verrà rimborsato se il tuo voto corrisponderà a quello della maggioranza
Enter amount to confirm transfer: Inserisci l'ammontare per confermare il trasferimento
Entered amount does not match target amo: L'ammontare inserito non corrisponde all'ammontare previsto
Finish voting and refund oracles with th: Termina la votazione e restituisci agli oracoli i loro fondi bloccati.
Flip has been saved to drafts: Il flip è stato salvato nelle bozze
In fase di ricezione delle parole chiave dei flip...
Great job! You have earned maximum rewar: Ottimo lavoro! Hai ottenuto il massimo delle ricompense
Idena validation will start soon: La validazione Idena partirà a breve
Including a share of minority voters' de: Inclusa una parte del deposito di voto della minoranza
Invite your friends and help them to pas: Invita i tuoi amici ed aiutali a passare le prime 3 validazioni
I link non sono permessi tra le opzioni di voto. Si prega di usare la Descrizione per i link.
Make all flips carefully: Realizza con cura tutti i flip
Make sure it is not possible to read the: Assicurati che non sia possibile leggere le immagini mischiate come una storia sensata
Dati non disponibili. Si prega di saltare il flip.
No voting deposit for oracles: Nessun deposito di voto per gli oracoli
Now solve bunch of flips to check its qu:
Now solve bunch of flips to check its quality. The flip is qualified
            if the majority, equals more than 2/3 participants, gives the same
            answer.
One of the keywords is not clearly visib: One of the keywords is not clearly visible in the story
Oracles can vote for any option. Rewards: Oracles can vote for any option. Rewards will be paid to everyone regardless of the outcome of the vote.
Oracles who vote against the majority ar: Oracles who vote against the majority are penalized. Voting will be started in a future date.
Period when secret votes are getting pub: Period when secret votes are getting published and results are counted
Please confirm that you want to use your: Please confirm that you want to use your public address for the website login
Please enter your identity address to co: Please enter your identity address to confirm termination. Stake will be transferred to the identity address.
Please read the rules carefully. You can: Please read the rules carefully. You can lose all your validation rewards if any of your flips is reported.
Please remove Report status from some ot: Please remove Report status from some other flips to continue
Please wait. The network is reaching con: Please wait. The network is reaching consensus on validated identities
Prolong the voting in order to select a: Prolong the voting in order to select a new voting committee
Read carefully \"What is a bad flip\" ru:
Read carefully "What is a bad flip" rules to avoid
                      penalty.
Refunded when voting in majority and los: Refunded when voting in majority and lost when voting in minority
Report all flips that break the rules: Report all flips that break the rules
Rewards for submitted and qualified flip: Rewards for submitted and qualified flips
Rewards will be paid to Oracles: Rewards will be paid to Oracles
Scan QR by your mobile phone or copy cod: Scansiona il QR dal tuo telefono cellulare o copia il codice sottostante per esportare la chiave privata.
Search the picture on the web: Search the picture on the web
See the full report in blockchain explor: See the full report in blockchain explorer
Select 4 images to tell your story: Seleziona 4 immagini per raccontare la tua storia
Select meaningful story: left or right: Select meaningful story: left or right
Shuffle images in order to make a nonsen: Mischia le immagini in modo da creare una sequenza di immagini senza senso
Solve the flips quickly when validation: Solve the flips quickly when validation starts. The first 6 flips must be submitted in less than 2 minutes.
Submit the form to deactivate your deleg: Submit the form to deactivate your delegation status.
Submit the form to deactivate your minin: Submit the form to deactivate your mining status. You can activate it again afterwards.
Terminate the contract to clean-up its s: Terminate the contract to clean-up its state and refund 50% of the stake to the owner
Terminate your identity and withdraw the:
Termina la tua identità e ritira lo stake. Lo stato della tua identità
            verrà impostato come 'Non validato'.
The amount is larger than your balance: The amount is larger than your balance
The minimum share of the votes which an: The minimum share of the votes which an option requires to achieve before it becomes the voting outcome
The number of randomly selected oracles: The number of randomly selected oracles allowed to vote
The share of Oracle committee sufficient: The share of Oracle committee sufficient to determine the voting outcome
There are no votings for you: There are no votings for you
There are no votings for you because you: There are no votings for you because your status is not validated.
There are numbers or letters indicating: There are numbers or letters indicating the order
There is a sequence of enumerated object: There is a sequence of enumerated objects
There is text that is necessary to read: There is text that is necessary to read to solve the flip
Think up a short story about someone/som: Think up a short story about someone/something related to the two key words below according to the template "Before — Something happens — After"
This vote is not available to you. Only: This vote is not available to you. Only validated identities randomly selected to the committee can vote.
Title: Title
To become a validator of Idena blockchai: To become a validator of Idena blockchain you can activate your mining status. Keep your node online to mine iDNA coins.
To get a reward for the voting you must: To get a reward for the voting you must be online at least once during the period of vote counting
To take part in the validation, you need: To take part in the validation, you need an invitation code. Invitations can be provided by validated identities.
Total funds locked during the voting and: Total funds locked during the voting and paid to oracles and owner afterwards
Total score for the last 10 validations: Total score for the last 10 validations
Type your search in the box above to fin: Type your search in the box above to find images using search box
Waiting for rewards distribution or term: Waiting for rewards distribution or termination
You can also submit {{remainingOptionalF: You can also submit {{remainingOptionalFlips}} optional flips if you want.
You can disable delegation at the next e: You can disable delegation at the next epoch only
You can disable delegation at the next epoch only.
You can issue the invitation to the spec: You can issue the invitation to the specific identity address in Advanced section
You can lose your stake, all your mining: You can lose your stake, all your mining and validation rewards if you delegate your mining status.
You can not submit flips. Please get val: You can not submit flips. Please get validated first.
You have been invited to join the upcomi: You have been invited to join the upcoming validation ceremony. Click the button below to accept the invitation.
You haven't submitted your answers in ti: You haven't submitted your answers in time. This validation session is over.
Non hai ancora selezionato alcun contatto.
You may lose rewards. Are you sure?: You may lose rewards. Are you sure?
You must either choose start date or sta: You must either choose start date or start now
You must provide at least 2 options: You must provide at least 2 options
You must provide valid URL including pro: You must provide valid URL including protocol version
You must specify your own identity addre: You must specify your own identity address
You need to create at least 3 flips per:
You need to create at least 3 flips per epoch to participate
                    in the next validation ceremony. Follow step-by-step
                    instructions.
You need to get Verified status to be ab: You need to get Verified status to be able to terminate your identity and withdraw the stake
You need to get Verified status to get t: You need to get Verified status to get the locked funds into the normal wallet
You will get {{invitationRewardRatio}} o: You will get {{invitationRewardRatio}} of the invitation rewards if your invite is activated now
You'll get rewarded for every successful: You'll get rewarded for every successfully qualified flip.
Your answers for the validation session: Your answers for the validation session have been submitted successfully!
Your node was offline more than 1 hour. The penalty will be charged automatically. Once it's fully paid you'll continue to mine coins.
You’re about to send iDNA from your wall: You’re about to send iDNA from your wallet to the following address
You’re about to sign and send tx from yo: You’re about to sign and send tx from your wallet
onboardingValidateSubscribe: <0>Subscribe</0> to the Idena Announcements (important updates only)
reviewMissingFlips: You need to answer <2>all flips</2> otherwise you may fail the validation.
reviewMissingReports: In order to get maximum rewards use <2>all available reports</2> for the worst flips.
Are you sure you want to cancel the sche: Sei sicuro di voler annullare la validazione in programma?
Can not schedule the training validation: Non è possibile programmare la validazione di prova perché si sovrappone alla cerimonia di validazione reale.
Non è possibile programmare la validazione di prova. È già stata fatta richiesta per un'altra validazione.
Create password to encrypt your account: Crea una password per criptare il tuo account
Educate your community about Idena: Informa la tua comunità su Idena
Enter an invitation code to get a free s: Inserisci un codice d'invito per ottenere una connessione gratuita a un nodo condiviso
Enter password to unlock your account: Inserisci la password per sbloccare il tuo conto
Enter your private key backup. You can e: Inserisci il backup della tua chiave privata. Puoi esportare la tua chiave privata dall'app Idena (vedi pagina Impostazioni).
Find an invitation code and activate it: Ottieni un codice d'invito e attivalo appena possibile. I codici d'invito scadono 5 minuti prima della validazione.
I understand that Idena cannot recover t: Sono consapevole del fatto che Idena non può recuperare la mia chiave privata.
Idena supports only one active tab with: Idena supporta solo una tab attiva per la web app. Ricarica la pagina per continuare a utilizzare questa tab o chiudila.
Learn about the validation process and g: Familiarizza col processo di validazione e ottieni un certificato. Puoi fornirlo come prova a una persona validata per ottenere un codice di invito.
Make sure you have the private key backu: Assicurati di avere un backup della tua chiave privata. Altrimenti perderai accesso al tuo conto.
Motivate your audience to join and help: Incoraggia il tuo pubblico a partecipare e aiutalo ad ottenere un invito
Node operator provides you the shared no: L'operatore del nodo ti fa usare il nodo condiviso per la prossima cerimonia di validazione
51% consensus is required to make a deci: È necessario il consenso del 51% per prendere una decisione
Access to the shared node will be expire: L'accesso al nodo condiviso scadrà dopo la cerimonia di validazione {{date}}
Backup your private key: Fai un backup della tua chiave privata
Can not be used for validation: Non può essere usato per la validazione
Can not send scheduled transaction:: Non è possibile mandare la transazione programmata:
Enter shared node API key: Inserisci l'API key del nodo condiviso
Enter your private key backup: Inserisci il backup della tua chiave privata
Failed. Please try again: Fallito. Per favore prova di nuovo
I understand the risk of compromising my: Sono consapevole dei rischi di perdere o rivelare il backup della mia chiave privata.
Idena training validation is in progress: Training di validazione Idena in corso
Idena training validation will start soo: Il training di validazione Idena partirà a breve
La validazione Idena richiede un invito. Gli inviti sono distribuiti da persone che hanno passato la validazione in precedenza.
Import your private key backup to sign i: Importa il backup della tua chiave privata per entrare
Join the mining of the first human-centr: Partecipa al mining della prima criptovaluta umano-centrica
C'è un problema tra la chiave e la password. Prova di nuovo.
Make a photo of QR code or save your enc: Fai una foto del codice QR o salva la tua chiave privata criptata.
